entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:56 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 99.0 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: N 37 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy overnight. Local blowing snow. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except snowfall amount 15 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
